SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE# = "" :SET &UC4RB_VER_APP_ID# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &NL# = UC_CRLF() : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(&AGENT#,&UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH#,,,,'UC_LOGIN=&LOGIN#') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE#, &LINE#) : SET &UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE#, &NL#) : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
! Reading the xml : SET &XMLDOCU# = XML_OPEN(STRING,&UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE#) ! A bad XML string either leads to run time error, or returns a return code which can be read with sys_last_err_nr(). : SET &ERROR# = sys_last_err_nr() : IF &ERROR# > 0 : SET &ERROR_DETAILS# = sys_last_err_ins() : PRINT "ERROR: &ERROR_DETAILS#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="Error occured!!" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=50 : ENDIF
! Read app id from the response : SET &NODE# = XML_GET_FIRST_CHILD(&XMLDOCU#) : SET &NODE_NAME# = XML_GET_NODE_NAME(&NODE#) : IF &NODE_NAME# = "application" : SET &UC4RB_VER_APP_ID# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&NODE#, "@app_id") : ENDIF : XML_CLOSE
! check if App id is found or not : IF &UC4RB_VER_APP_ID# = "" : PRINT "ERROR: Unable to retrieve app id." : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="Unable to retrieve app id!!" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=50 : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_DELETE_FILE#=&UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.DELETE_FILE :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_VER_APP_ID#,,"WORKFLOW"
